Package jchain.net

Interface Publisher<V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MiningHarnessTest
    public interface Publisher<V>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void push​(V item)
      Pushes an item to all subscribers.
      void subscribe​(Subscriber<V> subscriber)
      Subscribes the subscriber to receive items pushed by the publisher.
      void unsubscribe​(Subscriber<V> subscriber)
      Unsubscribes the subscriber from receiveing items pushed by the Publisher.
